text.0: the somadrops benevolent come forth as they are purified.
text.1: bestowing wealth which all may see.
text.2: o indu high oer heaven and earth be thou increaser of our might.
text.3: the master of all strength be thou.
text.4: the winds are gracious in their love to thee the rivers flow to thee.
text.6: soma wax great from every side may vigorous powers unite in thee.
text.7: be in the gatheringplace of strength.
text.8: for thee brownhued the kine have poured imperishable oil and milk.
text.10: friendship o indu we desire with thee who bearest noble arms.
text.11: with thee o lord of all that is.
